document_data.name: Dolphin Bridge
document_data.mainbody: The '''Dolphin Bridge''' was one of the three emblematic bridges of [[Neverwinter]].
document_data.Description: The bridge was carved in the likeness of a [[dolphin]].
document_data.Location: The Dolphin Bridge, alongside the other two bridges, radiated out of [[Castle Never]], connecting it with the rest of the city. In the Dolphin's case, it connected the castle with the [[House of Knowledge (Neverwinter)|House of Knowledge]].
document_data.History: During the [[Ruining]] of [[1451 DR]], the Dolphin Bridge was destroyed by the cataclysm.
